General.Name: Guangdong Songyang Recycle Resources Co Ltd
General.Description: GuangDong SongYang Recycle Resources CO.,LTD engages in the research and development, production, and sale of recycled paper products in China. The company was formerly known as Shantou Songyang Paper Industry Co., Ltd. GuangDong SongYang Recycle Resources CO.,LTD was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Shantou, China.
General.Address: West Side of Office Building, Shantou, China, 515800
